content: five different textures combine to create this cozy crochet blanket that s perfect to liven up your home stitched in bernat blanket sparkle pattern features post stitches bobbles puff stitches half_double_crochet in the 3rd loop camel stitch and waffle stitch techniques to keep you engaged we love it in the modern shade featured but the pattern would be superb in any color that showcases the gorgeous stitchwork it s a satisfying project you ll want to do more than once
